CREATE TABLE public."Ticker"
(
    "TickerID" integer NOT NULL,
    "CommentID_FK" integer,
    "TickerFound" boolean,
    "TickerSymbol" text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "TickerSentiment" double precision,
    CONSTRAINT "Ticker_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("TickerID"),
    CONSTRAINT "CommentTableFK" FOREIGN KEY ("CommentID_FK")
        REFERENCES public."Reddit" ("RedditID") MATCH SIMPLE
        ON UPDATE NO ACTION
        ON DELETE NO ACTION
        NOT VALID
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE public."Ticker"
    OWNER to postgres;
-- Index: fki_CommentTableFK

-- DROP INDEX public."fki_CommentTableFK";

CREATE INDEX "fki_CommentTableFK"
    ON public."Ticker" USING btree
    ("CommentID_FK" ASC NULLS LAST)
    TABLESPACE pg_default;
